trans-unit.source: Firebolt deals 2 damage to any target. Flashback {4}{R} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)
Target player draws two cards. Flashback—{1}{U}, Pay 3 life. (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)
Target player discards two cards. You gain 3 life for each land card discarded this way.
A heart of light and a soul of darkness cannot coexist.

{1}{G}: Basking Rootwalla gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Activate only once each turn. Madness {0} (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)
Flying As long as Wonder is in your graveyard and you control an Island, creatures you control have flying.
"The awestruck birds gazed at Wonder. Slowly, timidly, they rose into the air."\n—*Scroll of Beginnings*
{R}, Sacrifice Goblin Legionnaire: It deals 2 damage to any target. {W}, Sacrifice Goblin Legionnaire: Prevent the next 2 damage that would be dealt to any target this turn.
As Engineered Plague enters the battlefield, choose a creature type. All creatures of the chosen type get -1/-1.
"The admixture of bitterwort in the viral brew has produced most favorable results."\n—Phyrexian progress notes

Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.) When Goblin Ringleader enters the battlefield, reveal the top four cards of your library. Put all Goblin cards revealed this way into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.
Target player sacrifices an attacking creature. Storm (When you cast this spell, copy it for each spell cast before it this turn. You may choose new targets for the copies.)
{2}, {T}: Add {B} for each Swamp you control.
Deep within the Cabal's vault, the Mirari pulsed like a dead sun-and its darkness radiated across Otaria.

trans-unit.source: Create a 6/6 green Wurm creature token. Flashback {3}{G} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)
